tool.name: RTPredict
tool.description: Predicts retention times for peptides using a model trained by RTModel.
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing #if $in_id: mkdir in_id && ln -s '$in_id' 'in_id/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in_id.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in_id.ext)' && #end if #if $in_text: mkdir in_text && ln -s '$in_text' 'in_text/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in_text.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in_text.ext)' && #end if #if $in_oligo_params: mkdir in_oligo_params && ln -s '$in_oligo_params' 'in_oligo_params/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in_oligo_params.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in_oligo_params.ext)' && #end if #if $in_oligo_trainset: mkdir in_oligo_trainset && ln -s '$in_oligo_trainset' 'in_oligo_trainset/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in_oligo_trainset.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in_oligo_trainset.ext)' && #end if mkdir svm_model && ln -s '$svm_model' 'svm_model/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $svm_model.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($svm_model.ext)' && #if "file_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir out_id_file && #end if #if "positive_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir out_id_positive && #end if #if "negative_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir out_id_negative && #end if #if "file_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir out_text_file && #end if
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && export PYTHONPATH='$__tool_directory__/CTDopts/' && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd #if $in_id: -in_id 'in_id/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in_id.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in_id.ext)' #end if #if $in_text: -in_text 'in_text/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in_text.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in_text.ext)' #end if #if $in_oligo_params: -in_oligo_params 'in_oligo_params/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in_oligo_params.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in_oligo_params.ext)' #end if #if $in_oligo_trainset: -in_oligo_trainset 'in_oligo_trainset/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in_oligo_trainset.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in_oligo_trainset.ext)' #end if -svm_model 'svm_model/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $svm_model.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($svm_model.ext)' #if "file_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -out_id:file 'out_id_file/output.${gxy2omsext("idxml")}' #end if #if "positive_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -out_id:positive 'out_id_positive/output.${gxy2omsext("idxml")}' #end if #if "negative_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -out_id:negative 'out_id_negative/output.${gxy2omsext("idxml")}' #end if #if "file_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -out_text:file 'out_text_file/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' #end if #if len(str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',')) == 0 | tee '$stdout' #end if
## Postprocessing #if "file_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'out_id_file/output.${gxy2omsext("idxml")}' '$out_id_file' #end if #if "positive_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'out_id_positive/output.${gxy2omsext("idxml")}' '$out_id_positive' #end if #if "negative_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'out_id_negative/output.${gxy2omsext("idxml")}' '$out_id_negative' #end if #if "file_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'out_text_file/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' '$out_text_file' #end if #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.name: in_oligo_params
param.label: input file with additional model parameters when using the OLIGO kernel

param.name: in_oligo_trainset
param.label: input file with the used training dataset when using the OLIGO kernel

param.name: svm_model
param.label: svm model in libsvm format (can be produced by RTModel)

param.name: total_gradient_time
param.label: The time (in seconds) of the gradient (peptide RT prediction)

param.name: rewrite_peptideidentification_rtmz
param.label: Rewrites each peptideidentification's rt and mz from prediction and calculation (according to the best hit)

param.name: max_number_of_peptides
param.label: The maximum number of peptides considered at once (bigger number will lead to faster results but needs more memory)

param.name: test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

param.name: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS
param.label: Optional outputs
param.option: file (Output file with predicted RT values)
positive (Output file with predicted RT values)
negative (Output file with predicted RT values)
file (Output file with predicted RT values)

data.name: out_id_file
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: out_id:file
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "file_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: out_id_positive
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: out_id:positive
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "positive_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: out_id_negative
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: out_id:negative
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "negative_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: out_text_file
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: out_text:file
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "file_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Predicts retention times for peptides using a model trained by RTModel.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/documentation/TOPP_RTPredict.html
